Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 95th/Damen
ShortDescription: Eastbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Damen, 96th, Longwood and 95th: due to, street blockage near 95th/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Damen, 96th, Longwood and 95th: due to, street blockage near 95th/Damen.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
